analyzed: thera vāda vinaya

original: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā rājagahe viharati veḷuvane kalandakanivāpe.

original: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmatā dabbena mallaputtena jātiyā sattavassena arahattaṁ sacchikataṁ hoti.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena āyasmatā dabbena malla puttena jātiyā satta vassena arahattam sacchikatam hoti

original: Yaṁ kiñci sāvakena pattabbaṁ sabbaṁ tena anuppattaṁ hoti.
analyzed: yam kiñci sāvakena pattabbam sabbam tena an uppattam hoti

original: Natthi cassa kiñci uttari karaṇīyaṁ, katassa vā paticayo.

original: Yaṁ kiñci sāvakena pattabbaṁ sabbaṁ mayā anuppattaṁ.
analyzed: yam kiñci sāvakena pattabbam sabbam mayā

original: Natthi ca me kiñci uttari karaṇīyaṁ, katassa vā paticayo.

original: Atha kho āyasmato dabbassa mallaputtassa etadahosi—

original: “yannūnāhaṁ saṅghassa senāsanañca paññapeyyaṁ bhattāni ca uddiseyyan”ti.

original: Atha kho āyasmā dabbo mallaputto sāyanhasamayaṁ paṭisallānā vuṭṭhito yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi.

original: Yepi te bhikkhū vikāle āgacchanti tesampi tejodhātuṁ samāpajjitvā teneva ālokena senāsanaṁ paññapeti.

original: Tena kho pana samayena rājagahe manussā icchanti therānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ abhisaṅkhārikaṁ piṇḍapātaṁ dātuṁ sappimpi telampi uttaribhaṅgampi.

original: So yenāyasmā dabbo mallaputto tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṁ dabbaṁ mallaputtaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi.

original: Ekamantaṁ nisinnaṁ kho kalyāṇabhattikaṁ gahapatiṁ āyasmā dabbo mallaputto dhammiyā kathāya sandassesi samādapesi samuttejesi sampahaṁsesi.

original: Atha kho kalyāṇabhattiko gahapati āyasmatā dabbena mallaputtena dhammiyā kathāya sandassito samādapito samuttejito sampahaṁsito āyasmantaṁ dabbaṁ mallaputtaṁ etadavoca—

analyzed: kassa bhante amhākam ghare svātanāya bhattam uddiṭṭhanti

original: “Mettiyabhūmajakānaṁ kho, gahapati, bhikkhūnaṁ tumhākaṁ ghare svātanāya bhattaṁ uddiṭṭhan”ti.

original: Atha kho kalyāṇabhattiko gahapati anattamano ahosi—

original: aññe odanena pucchissanti, aññe sūpena pucchissanti, aññe telena pucchissanti, aññe uttaribhaṅgena pucchissantī”ti.
analyzed: aññe odanena pucchissanti aññe sūpena pucchissanti aññe telena pucchissanti aññe uttaribhaṅgena pucchissanti iti

original: Te teneva somanassena na cittarūpaṁ rattiyā supiṁsu.

original: Atha kho mettiyabhūmajakā bhikkhū pubbaṇhasamayaṁ nivāsetvā pattacīvaraṁ ādāya yena kalyāṇabhattikassa gahapatino nivesanaṁ tenupasaṅkamiṁsu.

original: Addasā kho sā dāsī mettiyabhūmajake bhikkhū dūratova āgacchante. Disvāna koṭṭhake āsanaṁ paññapetvā mettiyabhūmajake bhikkhū etadavoca—

nisīdatha bhanta iti
atha kho mettiya bhūmajakānam bhikkhūnam etat ahosi

original: “nissaṁsayaṁ kho na tāva bhattaṁ siddhaṁ bhavissati. Yathā mayaṁ koṭṭhake nisīdeyyāmā”ti.
analyzed: nissasayam kho na tāva bhattam siddham bhavissati yathā mayam koṭṭhake nisīdeyyāma ati

original: Atha kho sā dāsī kaṇājakena bilaṅgadutiyena upagacchi—

bhuñjatha bhanta iti
mayam kho bhagini niccabhattikā ati

original: Api cāhaṁ hiyyova gahapatinā āṇattā— ‘ye, je, sve bhattikā āgacchanti te koṭṭhake āsanaṁ paññapetvā kaṇājakena bilaṅgadutiyena parivisā’ti.
